attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please return our retirment funds to the Isle of Man, Kaupthing Bank. Many people have been affected as well.  So please do the right thing. Thank you.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
